TEXT: The applicant is a company based in GPE . It is represented before the Court by PERSON ORG , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The applicant is the owner of an apartment in GPE , which it had let to a company , ORG
In a writ served on the tenant on DATE , the applicant company summoned the tenant to appear before ORG with a view to recovering possession of its apartment on the ground of rent arrears .

At the hearing of DATE , Ms. PERSON appeared before the Magistrate and declared that she was the user of the apartment and the de facto tenant . She thus opposed the termination of the contract and requested a delay in order to pay up the arrears . The Magistrate granted her a delay of DATE .

Ms. PERSON having failed to fulfil this obligation , by a decision of DATE , which was made enforceable on DATE , ORG upheld the validity of the notice to quit and ordered that the premises must be vacated by DATE .
On DATE the applicant company served notice on the tenant requiring her to vacate the premises .
On DATE the applicant company served notice on the tenant informing her that the order for possession would be enforced by a bailiff on DATE .

Police assistance was granted twice , and twice revoked on the grounds of the tenant 's low income and her committal to find alternative LOC , and this despite the complaints which the applicant company addressed to the competent committee of tenants and landlords set up by PERSON no . CARDINAL , on DATE and DATE . The bailiff 's attempts to recover possession , on DATE , DATE and DATE were unsuccessful .
The eviction was enforced by the bailiff on DATE with the assistance of the police .
The relevant domestic law is described in the ORG GPE judgment of DATE , to be published in the ORG 's official reports , § § DATE .
